name: Windwall
description: In response to being targeted by a projectile such as a ranged attack or a spell that requires a defense check, you attempt to summon a sheet of wind to help deflect it. Roll a 2d12 as your defense check instead of using your own skills.
charge: The wall of wind lasts until the start of your turn, allowing you protection against projectiles that came from the same general direction as the first.
